property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Accelerated Beta Test, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are ice, you may install and rez them, ignoring all costs. Trash the rest of the cards you looked at.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Link]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He flicked the display population to high, and was surrounded by a circle of floating holos. The ping-back was strong, the clearance level blue-one. Now to find the perfect place for a relay...

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may force the Corp to lose up to 5 [Credits], then you gain 2 [Credits] for each credit lost and take 2 tags.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put 12 [Credits] from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on this card, trash it. Take 3 [Credits] from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put 12 [Credits] from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on this card, trash it. Take 3 [Credits] from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may trash another of your installed cards to gain 3 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you scored an agenda this turn. Search R&D for 1 card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe you'll find the terms are quite favorable."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aggressive Secretary can be advanced. If you pay 2 [Credits] when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Memory Unit]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The rez cost of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just don't ask how he does it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please stay connected. Priority transfer in progress. An operator will shortly verif-"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to rez Archer, the Corp must forfeit an agenda. ⏎ The Corp gains 2 [Credits]. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. ⏎ Trash 1 program. ⏎ End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Gain 2 Credits||[Subroutine] Trash Target Program||[Subroutine] End the Run

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you think they... feel it?"

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Place 12 [Credits] from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it.
[Click]: Take 2 [Credits] from Armitage Codebusting.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drudge work, but it pays the bills.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Place 1 agenda counter on AstroScript Pilot Program when you score it.
Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break barrier subroutine. 2 [Credits]: +3 strength.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break barrier subroutine.||2 [Credits]: +3 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 8 [Credits] from the bank on Bank Job when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Bank Job, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of accessing cards you may take any number of credits from Bank Job.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." - Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 3 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes * orbit accessible to everyone... for a small fee.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [Click] [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When you score Breaking News, give the Runner 2 tags.
When the turn on which you scored Breaking News ends, the Runner loses 2 tags.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Deflector

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The Runner approaches the outermost piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Derez Cell Portal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where does it go?"

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The next piece of ice the Runner encounters during this run has +2 strength. Do 3 net damage unless the Runner breaks all subroutines on that piece of ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You ever get that feeling like you're shark food? Pay attention to that feeling." - Ji "Noise" Reilly

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Put +2 Strength on Target Ice||Inflict 3 net damage

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner is tagged. The Runner loses all credits in his or her credit pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: X [Credits], [Trash]: Choose a piece of rezzed ice protecting this server. That ice has +X strength until the end of the turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I solve problems."

property.name: Rules
property.value: X [Credits], [Trash]: Choose a piece of rezzed ice protecting this server. That ice has +X strength until the end of the turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I solve problems."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break barrier subroutine. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If at first you don't succeed, boost its strength and try again." - g00ru

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break barrier subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Generate Credits] Use these credits to pay for removing tags. [Trash]: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My roomie, he had a cousin with a college girlfriend whose brother's best friend was an addict, and the addict's mother used to live here. So yeah, there's a connection."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break ice subroutine. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength. [Click]: Place 1 virus counter on Crypsis. When an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Crypsis to break a subroutine ends, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash Crypsis.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break ice subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.||Remove 1 Virus (use only once per ice)||[Click]: Place 1 Virus counter on Crypsis

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break ice subroutine. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength. [Click]: Place 1 virus counter on Crypsis. When an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Crypsis to break a subroutine ends, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash Crypsis.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break ice subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.||Remove 1 Virus (use only once per ice)||[Click]: Place 1 Virus counter on Crypsis

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Generate Credits] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers or for installing virus programs

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I feel almost naked without it

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forfeit an agenda, [Click]: Gain 9 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shadier the dealer, better the price. Unless the dealer's too shady. Then there might be a hidden fee after they take your scrip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Do 1 net damage. Trash Data Mine.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Access HarmlessFile.datZ -> Are you sure? y/n

property.name: Rules
property.value:
When the Runner encounters Data Raven, he or she must either take 1 tag or end the run.
Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. [Subroutine] Trace3 - If successful, place 1 power counter on Data Raven.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Give the runner a Tag||[Subroutine] Trace 3. Place 1 Power Counter if succesful||Remove 1 hosted Power counter to give the Runner 1 Tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on Datasucker.
Hosted virus counter: Rezzed piece of ice currently being encountered has -1 strength until the end of the encounter.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on Datasucker.
Hosted virus counter: Rezzed piece of ice currently being encountered has -1 strength until the end of the encounter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Avoid receiving 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I get the feeling that this is the wrong place, Frank." "What makes you say that D?" "The curlers."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add 1 card (or up to 2 virus cards) from your heap to your grip.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anything worth doing is worth doing twice.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: onPlay[Add 1 card from your heap to your grip|-|Add 2 virus cards from your heap to your grip]

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ or R&D. You may trash, at no cost, any cards you access (even if the cards cannot normally be trashed).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You ever set something on fire just to watch it burn?

property.name: Rules
property.value:
+1 [Memory Unit]
Gain 1 [Credits] whenever you make a successful run.
Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Diesel gives you flames.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Djinn can host up to 3 [Memory Units] of non-icebreaker programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit. [Click], 1 [Credits]: Search your stack for a virus program, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Host Target Program (Must be used only immediately after you play a program)||Search for Virus in your Stack and put it in your Grip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 3 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. Be thankfully I got just the ticket..."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The Runner loses [Click], if able. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hey, hey! Wake up man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?" "I... don't remember."

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] The Runner loses [Click]||[Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All ice protecting this server has +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Floyd felt the anger in the man before him, ranting against simulants. His programming pushed a routine rebuttal to the front of his thoughts, and the urge to speak it was overwhelming. This is only gong to make things worse, he thought.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine. 2 [Credits]: +1 strength. When you install Femme Fatale, choose an installed piece of ice. When you encounter that ice, you may spend 1 [Credits] per subroutine on that ice to bypass it.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine.||2 [Credits]: +1 strength.||Pay 1 [Credits] per target ice subroutine to bypass it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose an unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp must either rez that ice or trash it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the hysteria in the room climbed higher up the corporate chain, an uneasy feeling of joblessness began to sink in on the lower rungs.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Consummate Professional

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."

property.value: Ghost Branch can be advanced. When the Runner accesses Ghost Branch, you may give the Runner 1 tag for each advancement token on Ghost Branch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break code gate subroutine. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It can slice through the thickest knots of data.

property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break code gate subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength

property.value: +2 [Memory Units] Whenever you install a virus program, place 1 virus counter on that program. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Engineering the Future

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time you install a card each turn, gain 1 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Effective. Reliable. Humane.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Engineering the Future

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time you install a card each turn, gain 1 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Effective. Reliable. Humane.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hadrian's Wall may be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement counter on it. [Subroutine] End the run. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. his constructs live up to it though."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 9 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. - The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner can spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Heimdall 1.0. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [Subroutine] End the run. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.||[Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Hostile takeover, gain 7 [Credits] and take 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are going to be some changes around here.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.value: [Subroutine] Trace3 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules
property.value: All ice is encountered with its strength lowered by 1.

property.value: Ice Wall can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner can spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Ichi 1.0. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. [Subroutine] Trace 1 - if successful, give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 brain damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trash target program.||[Subroutine] Trace 1. If successful give the Runner 1 Tag and inflict 1 brain damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 2 [Credits] or expose 1 card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bring back any memories, Monica?" - John "Animal" McEvoy

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. Bypass the first piece of ice encountered during this run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Personal Evolution

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When You Need the Human Touch.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Digital Tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lower the install cost of the first program or piece of hardware you install each turn by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are you listening?"

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Digital Tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lower the install cost of the first program or piece of hardware you install each turn by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are you listening?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click], 1 [Credits]: Exposes 1 card. Use this ability only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A little preparation goes a long way." - Gabriel Santago

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Gain 2 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Great Work was completed on a rainy Thursday afternoon. there were no seismic shifts, no solar flares, no sign from the earth or heavens that the world had changed. But upstalk in Heinlein, on a single Cybsoft manufactured datacore, the flickering data quantums of an account began to fill with creds. Real, honest-to-goodness UN certified creds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the Runner encounters Matrix Analyzer, you may pay 1 [Credits] to place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced. [Subroutine] Trace 2 - if successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Analyzing was great. Delegating commands turned out to be even better.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Place 1 Advancement token on Target card||[Subroutine] Trace 2. If successful give the Runner 1 Tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Medium. Each virus counter after the first on Medium allows you to access 1 additional card from R&D whenever you access cards from R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click], [Click], [Click]: Gain 7 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mining bosses are worse than any downstalk crime lords. Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, I don't care what gangs you got down there. In Heinlein there's just one law: the He3 must flow." - "Old" Rick Henry, escaped clone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click], [Click], [Click]: Gain 7 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mining bosses are worse than any downstalk crime lords. Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, I don't care what gangs you got down there. In Heinlein there's just one law: the He3 must flow." - "Old" Rick Henry, escaped clone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the installation cost by 3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Making News

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Generate Credits] Use these credits during trace attempts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Someone is Always Watching.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Making News

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Generate Credits] Use these credits during trace attempts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Someone is Always Watching.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Prevent the first net damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sucks energy like a martian terra-bot, but it keeps you focused

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grey Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner made a run during his or her last turn. Do 1 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Do 3 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i. //Samurai included.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine. 3 [Credits]: +5 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You feel Ninja before you see Ninja, if you see Ninja at all.

property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine.||3 [Credits]: +5 strength.

property.value: Place 1 agenda counter on Nisei MK II when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.

property.value: Hacker Extraordinaire

property.value: Whenever you install a virus program, the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.

property.value: "Watch this. It'll be funny."

property.value: "Watch this. It'll be funny."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 1 [Credits] when your turn begins.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is like the one you just bought, only better.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Parasite only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice has -1 strength for each virus counter on Parasite and is trashed if its strength is 0 or less. When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Parasite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine. 2 [Credits]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine.||2 [Credits]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Posted Bounty, you may forfeit it to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some two-cred newsy picks it up, even better. The scum could be in the alleys of Guayaquil of the slums of Bos Wash. Not to mention off-planet."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was a new texture in her phantom cortex. It had always been there, she realized. It was everything and nothing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "[Click]: Do 1 meat damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Expensive? Not when you're protecting a fortune as large as ours."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "[Click]: Do 1 meat damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Expensive? Not when you're protecting a fortune as large as ours."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Project Junebug can be advanced. If you pay 1 [Credits] when the Runner accesses Project Junebug, do 2 net damage for each advancement token on Project Junebug.

property.name: Rules
property.value: X is equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has. Place X advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Access to the largest consumer database in the galaxy has its advantages.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Link] When Rabbit Hole is installed, you may search your stack for another copy of Rabbit Hole and install it by paying its install cost. Shuffle your stack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not endless, it just feels that way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each time the Runner accesses an agenda from this server, he or she must pay 5 [Credits] as an additional cost in order to steal it. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Red Herrings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only in the root of HQ. Your maximum hand size is +2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jack Weyland built the Beanstalk and transformed the human race forever. I can't wait to see what we're going to do next."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trash 1 program.||[Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Prevent an installed program or an installed piece of hardware from being trashed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The life expectancy of a jacked construct is about that of a mayfly. In other words, short.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The advancement requirement of agendas installed in this server is lowered by 1. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear the coast is nice this time of year." "If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Black Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the runner is tagged. Do 4 meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries..."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Black Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the runner is tagged. Do 4 meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries..."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn. Trace3 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The SEA tipped us off to some suspicious data spikes up by the Castle." - Jerome Lock, on-duty tech

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click], trash a rezzed piece of ice: Gain 4 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feed the Feds our scraps, and they'll come back begging for more." - Richard Polasco, VP of Cyber-Security

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it. [Subroutine] The Corp gains 2 [Credits]. [Subroutine] Trace 3 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who knows what evil lurks in the memory diamonds of men? Weyland knows. -unsigned cyber-graffiti

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Gain 2 [Credits].||[Subroutine] Trace 3. If successful, give the Runner 1 Tag.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 1 advancement token on each of up to 2 different installed cards that can be advanced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And then there's these two crates. No eID." "Just leave those with me and forget you ever saw them."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Immediately install up to 3 cards (spending no clicks but paying all install costs).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The new heads were in. Their eyes always followed your movements when you unlocked the pressurized container and lifted the lid.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
If Snare! is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
If you pay 4 [Credits] when the Runner accesses Snare!, do 3 net damage and give the Runner 1 tag. Ignore this effect if the Runner accesses Snare! from Archives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." - g00ru

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your deck for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later...

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run, and gain 9 [Credits], which you may use only during this run. After the run is completed, suffer 1 brain damage (cannot be prevented) and return to the bank any of the 9 [Credits] not spent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 9 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards from R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." - Ele "Smoke" Scovak

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install The Personal Touch only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker has +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A z-loop here, a cortical wave there...

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2 [Memory Units] +2[Link] 2 [Generate Credits] Use the credits to pay for using icebreakers. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mode is the world."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the Runner encounters Tollbooth, he or she must pay 3 [Credits], if able. If the Runner cannot pay 3 [Credits], end the run. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ever heard of a catch-22?" "Remind me to forget it."

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Force the runner to lose exactly 3 [Credits] or end the run||[Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Bioroid-AP

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner can spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Viktor 1.0. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.||[Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." - Ele "Smoke" Scovak

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Do 2 net damage.||[Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Building a Better World

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 1 [Credits] whenever you play a transaction operation.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moving Upwards.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and lose [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Best place to go when you want to get your mind out of the gutter and take it inside." - Ji "Noise" Reilly

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and lose [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Best place to go when you want to get your mind out of the gutter and take it inside." - Ji "Noise" Reilly

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3 [Credits]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength. 1 [Credits]: Ice has -1 strength. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire and ichor...

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 3 [Credits]: Break ice subroutine.||1 [Credits]: -1 strength on target ice.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 0 [Credits]: Break code gate subroutine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner is about to expose a card, you may rez Zaibatsu Loyalty. 1 [Credits] or [Trash]: Prevent 1 card from being exposed.
